subject: Re: Changes to website

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel

Yes thank you.

That works now!

Nicki Cousens

Hi Nicole,

We have adjusted the 2fa settings, let me know if this works for you?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

Hi

I'm having problems logging into our website

It says this

LOGIN BLOCKED: 2FA is required to be active on your account. Please contact the site administrator.

Do you know how to fix this?

Thank you

Nicole Cousens

Associate Genetic Counsellor

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025



Email: nicolecousens@wolper.com.au

Phone: 0416042778

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Thank you so much for that Chris!

It's greatly appreciated!

Hi Nicole, 

Apologies for the delay, I am away from the office. 

Confirming "sex at birth" has been added to both forms as a mandatory option.

Hi Chris

Can I please ask for 1 more item being added to both of these consent forms

Participant Information - Genetics Wolper

Registration and consent - Genetics Wolper

Can you please add a place to enter "Sex at birth"

Thank you very much

Nicole Cousens

Associate Genetic Counsellor

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025



Email: nicolecousens@wolper.com.au

Phone: 0416042778

Perfect!

Thank you so much for your help!!

Nicki

Hi Nicole, 

Sure thing, confirming the update has been completed. You can see it here: https://www.genetics.wolper.com.au/our-programs/carrier-screen-program/registration-and-consent/

Can I then add a box like that

For when you tick privately funded testing

Can it say

I give consent for the use of my DNA sample for testing of 390 genes(in females) or 360 genes(in males). I've had the opportunity to ask questions and I'm satisfied with the explanations and answers to the questions. I understand that genetic counselling will be available for myself and my family if required. I consent for my results to be provided to me by email or telephone.

Hi Nicole, 

Upon digging into the form, I can see the section is still there. It is set up to display upon clicking check box for: Funded testing through Wolper. 

The updates that were originally requested only required a change in text, not function. 
--//--
Towards the bottom of under "select your test"
Can the "Privately funded testing…" now say "Privately funded testing through Virtus Genetics for 390 genes (costs $510 after Medicare rebate)"
--//-- 

The attached screenshot shows the section I'm referring to. Can you please confirm that you can see that as well?

Hi Chris

I've just realised that you've deleted something from the consent form.

When you click on "private funded testing"

There used to be boxes there to provide consent, and now I cant see them. Are you able to get them back up?

Thank you

Nicki

Hi Nicole,

Absolutely. Confirming a field has been added for "Medicare Card Number". Screenshot attached.

Please let us know if there are any further updates.
